item.title: Social Media Content Strategist for Influencers/content creators - Upwork
item.description:
We are an Influencer and Content Agency seeking a passionate and creative individual with expertise in short-form content, hooks, and viral trends. Experience in managing Instagram accounts and using Capcut is preferred.

Responsibilities:

Research and identify trends within specific niches on Instagram and analyze what makes content viral.
Develop content ideas tailored to our clients' brands and preferences.
Work alongside content creators and influencers to craft compelling short-form content ideas.
Communicate with clients to assist and update their content plans.
Manage clients' main Instagram profiles.
Edit client content with innovative hooks and creative ideas using Capcut or other editing apps, or assist our editors with editing or caption ideas for the videos.
Compensation:

Starting salary: €2500 per month, which may vary depending on your qualifications and experience. Promotions and salary increases will always be on the table in the future.
Qualifications:

Proven experience in creating and managing short-form content.
Strong understanding of what makes content go viral.
Proficiency in using Capcut and other editing tools.
Experience working with content creators or influencers is highly desirable.
If you're excited about creating impactful content and helping brands thrive on social media, we'd love to hear from you!

Additional Application Instructions
Please fill out the form, and we will contact you via Email or Telegram. Looking forward to hearing from you!

Budget: $2,500
Posted On: June 28, 2024 17:08 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Content Strategy, Digital Marketing Strategy, Content Creation, Communications, Market Research, Marketing Strategy, Instagram Marketing, TikTok Marketing, Content Editing
Skills: Content Strategy, Digital Marketing Strategy, Content Creation, Communications, Market Research, Marketing Strategy, Instagram Marketing, TikTok Marketing, Content Editing
Country: Iceland
click to apply

item.title: Experienced YouTube Video Editor Needed For On-Going Contract - Upwork
item.description:
We are a popular health/fitness YouTube channel looking for a skilled editor with experience in YouTube videos.

We create 1-2x videos per week for our channel and are looking to build a relationship with an editor to take on the on-going editing work.

Scope of work on-going would include:
- Timely edits of 1-2x YouTube videos per week (mix of talking head, VLOGs, broll, etc.)
- Editing of 1-2 YouTube shorts (from time to time)

Please have experience editing for YouTube using jump cuts, clean and engaging transitions, a tool kit of high quality lower thirds that you can customize and good pacing skills.

MUST be able to color grade footage provided as well.

Provide examples of videos you have edited for YouTube specifically.

Hourly Range: $40.00-$63.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 16:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Color Grading, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Final Cut Pro, YouTube
Skills: Social Media Video, Color Grading, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Final Cut Pro, YouTube
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.

item.title: Instagram Ad Creator for Fine Jewelry Subscription Service - Upwork
item.description:
Description:
We are seeking a talented and creative professional to develop four social media ads for our fine jewelry subscription service. Our goal is to communicate the unique value propositions of our service through compelling and engaging ads.

Project Objectives: 4 sets of ads built for instagram

1. Create 4 Instagram Ads: squares for in feed and rectangular for stories.
   - Combination of static & motion centric ads (live action footage not needed)

2. Campaign Goals:
   - Awareness & direct action.
   - We will run these ads simultaneously to gather insights about our audience.
   - Analyze the performance of each ad to identify which messaging resonates most effectively.
   - Use the data collected to refine our marketing strategy and better reach our target audience in the future.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in creating high-quality social media ads, preferably for retail/luxury or subscription-based services.
- Proven experience creating D2C ads.
- Ability to convey brand messages clearly and creatively.
- Proficiency in graphic design and video editing tools.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Deliverables:
- Four sets of distinct social media ads (sized for in-feed & story) aligned with the objectives outlined above.
- Source files for all creative assets.

If you are passionate about luxury products and have a knack for creating ads that captivate and convert, I would love to hear from you. Please include your portfolio and relevant work samples with your application.


Hourly Range: $55.00-$72.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 16:41 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Advertising Design, Fashion & Beauty, Video Editing, Marketing Strategy
Skills: Graphic Design, Advertising Design, Fashion & Beauty, Video Editing, Marketing Strategy
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Full Time Youtube Video Editor Long and Short Clips - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a full time employee in video editor space.  I placed a sample of the short youtube video we would like to make also long video does not need to have animations just editing.
We will not be working with any agency only full time employee. Need to be able to work at least 8 hours per day Monday thru Friday. We have regular meeting over zoom.

What We Are Looking For:

Experience: You have proven experience in editing YouTube videos.

Availability: You can deliver a minimum of 3 shorts videos per day and 2+ long per week

Quality: You are always seeking ways to improve your work and analyze video performance to see what works well and what can be improved.

Send us your portfolio. We would also like to know if you are willing to create a short sample video to see if we are a good match.


Hourly Range: $15.00-$32.00

item.title: Video editor 20 second clip - Upwork
item.description:
**Description:**
We are looking for a talented video editor to create an engaging and high-quality 20-second social media video using cell phone footage of our property. The goal is to make the video visually appealing and intriguing to attract potential guests for various events.

**Responsibilities:**
- Edit provided cell phone footage into a captivating 20-second video.
- Ensure the video is high-quality and suitable for social media platforms.
- Incorporate any necessary transitions, effects, and music to enhance the video's appeal.
- Deliver the final video in a format ready for upload on social media.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience in video editing, specifically for social media.
- Proficiency with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
- Creative mindset with the ability to produce visually stunning content.
- Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines.

**To Apply:**
Please submit your portfolio showcasing previous work on similar projects. Attach samples of your best social media videos to demonstrate your editing skills.

**Compensation:** Competitive, based on experience and quality of work.

**Deadline:** Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis until the position is filled.


Here are examples
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/i46e4oe89w8nb0orm0137/AM5nkmLt_d3H0EJWkqxCcEA?rlkey=bir47wwp6m4l1glurq79400q5&dl=0



Posted On: June 28, 2024 16:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Split Spotify video podcast into short social media clips - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video editor to chop up a 30-minute podcast on Spotify into engaging 30-60 second segments that can be shared on social media platforms. The goal is to create attention-grabbing clips that will captivate our target audience and drive engagement. As the editor, you will be responsible for selecting the most compelling moments from the podcast. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing, a strong sense of storytelling, and the ability to work with tight deadlines.

Required skills:
  - Video editing software proficiency (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong sense of timing and pacing
  - Creative thinking and ability to identify engaging moments
  - Familiarity with social media platforms and their video requirements

Budget: $150

item.title: Facebook Video Ad Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We're seeking a skilled video ad creator to develop a captivating and professional video ad for our Facebook campaign. We need a video that effectively communicates our message, grabs attention, and encourages viewers to take action.

Responsibilities:

Develop a 15-30 second video ad tailored for Facebook
Scriptwriting, storyboarding, and conceptualizing the ad
Filming or sourcing high-quality footage
Editing the video to include engaging visuals, text overlays, and background music
Ensuring the final video adheres to Facebook's ad guidelines
Providing revisions based on feedback

Requirements:

Proven experience in creating successful video ads, preferably for Facebook
Strong portfolio showcasing previous video ad work
Ability to convey a clear and compelling message within a short timeframe
Knowledge of current trends and best practices for Facebook video ads
Excellent communication skills and responsiveness to feedback
Ability to deliver the final product within the agreed timeline

To Apply:

Please submit your proposal with:

A brief overview of your experience and why you're a good fit for this project
Links to your portfolio or samples of previous video ad work
Your proposed timeline for completing the video ad
Your rate for this project
We're excited to see your creativity and expertise in action. Thank you for your interest in working with us!

Hourly Range: $18.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 16:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Corporate Video, Facebook, Video Commercial, Facebook Advertising
Skills: Corporate Video, Facebook, Video Commercial, Facebook Advertising
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Experienced VSL Creator for Service Showcase Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced VSL (Video Sales Letter) creator to develop an engaging and impactful explainer video showcasing our range of services, features, and benefits. The ideal candidate will have a strong track record in creating attention-grabbing VSLs that effectively communicate complex ideas in a clear and compelling manner. This project requires a deep understanding of persuasive storytelling techniques and the ability to distill key information into a visually appealing and concise video format.

Key skills required for this job include:
- Proficiency in VSL creation
- Strong video editing and animation skills
- Expertise in scriptwriting and storytelling
- Ability to incorporate graphics and visual elements effectively
- Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

If you possess the expertise and creativity to bring our services to life through a captivating VSL, we would love to hear from you. Please include samples of your previous work in your application.

Budget: $100

Category: Video Production
